renderer::TextureFiltering

renderer::TextureFiltering Namespace Reference

Texture filtering modes.


Enumerations

enum  {
  NEAREST, LINEAR, NEAREST_MIPMAP_NEAREST, NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR,
  LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST, LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR
}

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
NEAREST  Filtering is disabled.
LINEAR  Filtering is linear.
NEAREST_MIPMAP_NEAREST  Filtering is 1.5-linear (lerp via two nearest fragments of different mip-levels. Only for use with min filter).
NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR  Filtering is 1.5-linear (lerp via nearest fragment of first level and lerp'ed value from another one. Only for use with min filter).
LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST  Filtering is 1.5-linear (lerp via lerp'ed value of first level and nearest fragment from another one. Only for use with min filter).
LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR  Filtering is bi-linear (sometimes called three linear. Only for use with min filter).
